Opinion
Per Curiam,
Orders affirmed.

casebody.head_matter:
Surace Appeals. Barnhouse Appeals.
Argued April 30, 1974.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Paul Matzko, with him Erskine, Wolf son, Matzko & Pierson, for appellant at Nos. 409 to 412, inclusive.
Daniel I. Murphy, with him Tyler E. Wren, for appellants at Nos. 413 and 414.
Harry Wolov, for appellee.
May 3, 1974:
